Title: Object: Repos de la Vierge
Series: Galerie des peintres flamands, hollandais et allemands de Le Brun
Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin seated against a tree in lower left while feeding Christ, St Joseph taking his donkey to a river to drink at right, a harvest scene in background; after Paul Bril. 1778 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Jacques Philippe Le Bas (engraving)
Print made by: Carl Guillaume Weisbrod (etching)
Published by: Jacques Philippe Le Bas
Curator's comments: From 'Galerie des peintres flamands, hollandais et allemands de Le Brun', see 1870,0625.753 for comment. For an earlier state of this plate see also 1848,1125.438.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (111) (Le Bas)
Associated names: Associated with: Jean Baptiste Pierre Le Brun
